has_access_to_all_future_projects.description: Indicates if the user has access to all future projects.

is_contractor.description: Shows if the user is a contractor.

is_admin.description: Indicates if the user is an admin.

is_project_manager.description: Indicates if the user is a project manager.

can_see_rates.description: Indicates if the user can see rates.

can_create_projects.description: Shows if the user can create projects.

can_create_invoices.description: Shows if the user can create invoices.

is_active.description: Shows if the user is currently active.

created_at.description: Date and time when the user was created.

updated_at.description: Date and time when the user record was last updated.

default_hourly_rate.description: User's default hourly rate for billing.

cost_rate.description: The cost rate associated with the user.

roles.description: List of roles associated with the user.

avatar_url.description: URL of the user's avatar image.

calendar_integration_enabled.description: Indicates if calendar integration is enabled for the user.

calendar_integration_source.description: Source of calendar integration for the user.
